title: Technology Integration Design Program for Pre-Service Teacher Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Theory and General Computer Literacy
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing mastery of real-time collaboration tools and digital educational content creation technologies in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Participants can accurately explain the instructional design process using various ICT tools with over 80% precision.
Participants can apply creativity, accessibility, and educational effectiveness criteria with over 90% fulfillment while producing digital educational materials.
Participants iteratively improve technology-integrated lesson models through peer evaluations at least four times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
